list-item.p: Bats are considered the possible originating source of SARS-CoV-2.
Different types of immune cells are considered as reliable biomarkers in severe COVID-19 disease.
The viral spike glycoprotein encoded by spike gene facilitates viral binding to ACE2 receptor of the host cell membrane.
CRISPR-Cas12, ddPCR and RT-LAMP methods may improve the detection of SARS-CoV-2.
Active hexose correlated compound (AHCC), an immune-stimulant can be tested against COVID-19.
